item.title: emacs 스크롤을 pixcel 단위로 변경하기
item.description: 아래와 같이 설정해주면 inline 이미지에서 스크롤시 점프하지 않는다. ;; https://emacs.stackexchange.com/questions/10354/smooth-mouse-scroll-for-inline-images (pixel-scroll-mode) (setq pixel-dead-time 0) ; Never go back to the old scrolling behaviour. (setq pixel-resolution-fine-flag t) ; Scroll by number of pixels instead of lines (t = frame-char-height pixels). (setq mouse-wheel-scroll-amount '(1)) ; Distance in pixel-resolution to scroll each mouse wheel event. (setq mouse-wheel-progressive-speed nil) ; Progressive speed is too fast for me.
